biotools.summary:
A High-Performance and Versatile DNA Methylation Data-Analysis Toolkit.

Msuite: Multi-mode DNA methylation data analysis suite.

Msuite is written in Perl and R for Linux/Unix platform. To run Msuite you need a Linux/Unix machine with Bash 4 (or higher), Perl 5.10 (or higher) and R 2.10 (or higher) installed.

bioschemas.name: Msuite
